description: Number of (n - 5)-dissections of an n-gon (equivalently, the number of two-dimensional faces of the (n-3)-dimensional associahedron) modulo the dihedral action.
references: P. Lisonek, Closed forms for the number of polygon dissections. Journal of Symbolic Computation 20 (1995), 595-601.
R. C. Read, On general dissections of a polygon, Aequat. Math. 18 (1978), 370-388.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: D. Bowman and A. Regev, Counting symmetry classes of dissections of a convex regular polygon, arXiv:1209.6270, 2012.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Entry revised (following Bowman and Regev) by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 28 2012
